docs.text:
CTMCEnsemble.jl Documentation


#


CTMCEnsemble.build
 
 
Function
.


build(preds, nclass=0; weights=nothing)




Build the generator matrix.


Example


julia
 build([([0.5, 0.5], [1, 2]), ([0.5, 0.5], [2, 3])])
3×3 Array{Float64,2}:
 -0.5   0.5   0.0
  0.5  -1.0   0.5
  0.0   0.5  -0.5




source


#


CTMCEnsemble.stationdist
 
 
Function
.


stationdist(G)




Compute stationary probability distribution given generator $G$.


Example


julia
 G = build([([0.5, 0.5], [1, 2]), ([0.5, 0.5], [2, 3])]);

julia
 stationdist(G)
3×1 Array{Float64,2}:
 0.333333
 0.333333
 0.333333




source
